full_text:
Rating Worksheets

Lesson
objectives

¢ Describe rating worksheets
¢ Use rating worksheets

| The rating worksheet

Rating Analyst What is a rating worksheet
used for in PolicyCenter?

A rating worksheet shows
the details of the calculation
steps including the actual
values during rating. This
information is useful for
both underwriters/auditors
and developers.

Julia
Implementation
Architect

!

| Who uses rating worksheets? i
Underwriters and auditors use rating

Implementation f worksheets to see how a policy was rated.
Architect

|

This allows them to answer questions and
make adjustments if needed.

Developers use rating worksheets to debug
rating code.

| Purpose of a rating worksheet Gi

« Rating worksheets show actual values
that a rate routine used to calculate
rate for a quoted policy or transaction

¢ Rating worksheets are designed to
provide more insight into the results
achieved by the rating process.

« Rating worksheets present authorized
users with a detailed view of premium
calculations.

| Demonstration G

Rating worksheets

click here

Note: The demonstration opens a new tab in your browser. When the demonstration ends, the
original course launch window appears. Return to this window to continue this presentation.

Question

_— — What permission setting allows users to view rating worksheets?

¢
4
¢

SS oe Oooo ee Oooo ooOoD

Answer fa

_—- — What permission setting allows users to view rating worksheets?

¢
oe The user must have the ratingworksheetview permission to be able to view a rating

worksheet.

SS oe ooo ee oe oOoOe SoD
